ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hang out in Mistmoore and maybe you can get one from a gypsy musician.  The gypsy lute adds 5% and a +mr stat.  Nice little touch.  Then you are kinda screwed
ygData.messageBody:
Hang out in Mistmoore and maybe you can get one from a gypsy musician. The
gypsy lute adds 5% and a +mr stat. Nice little touch. Then you are kinda
screwed until you can get a 7 string lute from the Maestro in Hateville.
They could use a nice magic string instrument with 15-20% bonus for the mid
levels to acquire.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Bill Costlow" <atlatyl@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 8:18 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?


> I'm finding, at lvl 26 that I use my lute an aweful
> lot now....Lamant, Hymm, Lullaby and CoD.
>
> Be nice to have a magic lute;-)
